com.enhancell.remote

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enhancell.remote.Manager

  • public final class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class that provides access to the client connections using Bluetooth.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Manager.Listener
      Listener interface that notifies of found connections.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manager(android.content.Context context, Manager.Listener listener, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a Manager instance that can be used to connect to client devices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the manager instance.
      boolean connectLocal()
      Initiates the lookup for local device.
      void findBluetoothDevices()
      Initiates the lookup for existing connections.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name that is passed to the clients to identify the host.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manager

        public Manager(android.content.Context context,
               Manager.Listener listener,
               java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a Manager instance that can be used to connect to client devices.
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        listener - listener instance.
        name - name that is passed to the clients to identify the host controller.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the manager instance.

      • findBluetoothDevices

        public void findBluetoothDevices()
        Initiates the lookup for existing connections. The lookup iterates the paired Bluetooth connections and attempts to connect to running client instances.

      • connectLocal

        public boolean connectLocal()
        Initiates the lookup for local device.
        Returns:
        true if the connection was successful.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name that is passed to the clients to identify the host.
        Returns:
        host name.
